name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sekiro Faces Dragon’s Fury Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash the fierce energy of Sekiro as he faces the Dragon’s Fury in this dynamic Live Wallpaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab into a battlefield where Sekiro’s unrelenting strength meets the fiery power of the dragon in stunning, animated visuals.

Feel the intensity of the fight and the captivating art style of Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice, every time you open a new tab.

Features:
🐉 Live Wallpaper: Dynamic animations of Sekiro battling the Dragon’s Fury, showcasing the game's stunning action and artistry.
🌐 Popular Site Shortcuts: Instantly access your favorite websites with pre-set shortcuts.
➕ Addable Shortcuts: Customize your new tab with links to your most-visited sites.
🔍 Search Bar: Easily browse using your chosen search engine.
🕒 Calendar & Clock: Stay organized with a built-in calendar and clock display.
Why Choose This Extension?
This secure, lightweight extension provides a seamless browsing experience and respects your privacy. It can be easily uninstalled via your browser settings.

Explore more live wallpapers inspired by epic battles, legendary characters, and cinematic gameplay. Additional tools include a note-taking feature, a privacy policy, and a direct uninstall option.

Download the Sekiro Faces Dragon’s Fury Live Wallpaper now and experience the adrenaline rush of battle with every new tab. Visit our website to discover more thrilling extensions!
